docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v2 is currently in development and is not the default version. You may use v2 by either passing ‘version=2’ in the Accept Header or entering api/v2/ in the URL.

methods.name: create
methods.full_description: Adds role ‘Anonymous’ to the user by default

methods.name: update
methods.full_description: Adds role ‘Anonymous’ to the user if it is not already present. Only admin can set admin account.
examples:
PUT /api/users/980190969
{
  "user": {
    "login": "johnsmith"
  }
}
200
{
  "user": {
    "admin": null,
    "auth_source_id": 980190962,
    "compute_resources_andor": "or",
    "created_at": "2013-12-23T09:55:47Z",
    "domains_andor": "or",
    "facts_andor": "or",
    "filter_on_owner": null,
    "firstname": null,
    "hostgroups_andor": "or",
    "id": 980190969,
    "last_login_on": null,
    "lastname": null,
    "locale": null,
    "locations_andor": "or",
    "login": "johnsmith",
    "mail": "foo@bar.com",
    "organizations_andor": "or",
    "password_hash": null,
    "password_salt": null,
    "subscribe_to_all_hostgroups": null,
    "updated_at": "2013-12-23T09:55:47Z"
  }
}
